name: The Gunslinger (Evilous)
description:
The gunslinger is a third person shooter that has roguelike elements

It has 50 levels, 23 tracks, 5 bosses and one ending.

Most of the trailer was made with webmcam and that isn't the best way to record gameplay. I will make a better trailer eventually.

This is mostly a test to see if the game is worth putting on steam or not. Since certain things need testing I was worried about a steam release. I shouldn't trust myself with that testing since I have a major bias. I just want to make the game better than what it is already. I might make some changes or add new levels later on. I might add some bonus levels as well to make the game have more content. I would highly recommend some feedback so I can make some last minute changes and edits to make the game better overall.

I should warn players that near the end there is a level that might be considered eye gore. I don't think most people will get to that point for a bit but just a heads up.
